original_text: And he said to the king of Israel, Put thine hand upon the bow. And he put his hand upon it: and Elisha put his hands upon the king's hands.
korean_text: 또 이스라엘 왕에게 이르되 왕의 손으로 활을 잡으소서 하매 그가 손으로 잡으니 엘리사가 자기 손을 왕의 손 위에 얹고

sentences.original_text: And he said to the king of Israel
Put thine hand upon the bow
And he put his hand upon it
and Elisha put his hands upon the king's hands
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리사가 왕의 손 위에 자신의 손을 얹었다
